item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact You may easily reach me via Twitter @AnomalRoil. If you want to, you can also cold mail me, I’m fine with this. If you wish to communicate with me in a secure way, you may want to use my PGP key whose fingerprint is: 9B52 42E1 A9D7 1F7C 1D06 E4DD F578 2536 7618 1666. I’m fine with a few different languages: ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡· ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡§ ðŸ‡©ðŸ‡ª What’s more, I’m trying to operate by Crocker’s Rules, so you can be informative.

item.title: About
item.description: About me After doing a bilingual German&French high school degree in Frauenfeld, I’ve got a Bachelor Degree in Mathematics at the EPFL. I then decided that I wanted to work in IT security, possibly cryptography, and in order to do so, I kept going with a Master Degree in Communication Sciences oriented towards “IT Security and Business Networks”. You can find me online under the “AnomalRoil” nickname. About romailler.ch I basically wanted to have an easy to remember, easy to use email address ; I’m born in Switzerland and romailler.
